title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Skills: CTML-Based iVR Language Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain five essential elements for designing an iVR learning environment based on CTML principles.
Learners can create language education scenarios applying Multimedia Learning Theory (CTML) in an iVR environment.
Learners can derive three measurement indicators to evaluate the effectiveness of iVR-based learning activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
